topic.title: About
topic.section: The About the Conference page presents current conferences (if applicable), contact people, policies, submissions and other relevant information. This is where potential Authors can learn about the scope and focus of the conference, the scheduled conference's Peer Review Policy, how to prepare and format a submission, and how to submit a paper to the conference. Conference Organizers are listed here, as are sponsors and sources of support. There is a site map, and an entry on the publishing system.
